沔字的基本解释

沔
miǎn
水流充满河道。
〔沔水〕水名，在中国陕西省，是汉水的上流。
古同“湎”，沉迷。

沔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miǎn］
［《廣韻》彌兗切，上獮，明。］
亦作“汅1”。
(1)水流满貌。
(2)通“湎”。沉迷。
(3)水名。北源出自今陕西省留坝县西，一名沮水；西源出自今宁强县北。二源合流后通称汉水，故古代也作汉水的别称。又沔水入江以后，今湖北省武汉市以下的长江古代亦通称沔水。故《水经》叙沔水下游一直到入海为止。

沔字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　沔； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页611第16
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】彌兗切【正韻】美辨切，?音緬。水名。【說文】沔水出武都沮縣東狼谷。【書·禹貢】浮于潛，逾于沔。【傳】漢上曰沔。　又【廣輿記】沔口，在漢陽府城西南。【地理通釋】漢入江處謂之沔口。【漢陽圖經】漢沔本一水也。　又州名。【廣韻】春秋鄖國之地，戰國時屬楚，秦屬南郡，武德初置沔州。【廣輿記】今爲漢陽府。　又沔陽州，屬安陸府，漢竟陵地，梁沔陽。又沔縣，屬漢中府，本漢沔陽縣。又沔池縣，屬河南府。?見【廣輿記】。　又水流滿也。【詩·小雅】沔彼流水，朝宗于海。　又與湎通。【史記·樂書】流沔沈佚。　又【集韻】美隕切，音閔。水名。【書·禹貢註】沔池。一音亡忍切。　又母婢切，音弭。與濔同。水盛貌。詳濔字註。

沔字的起名意思

水名。汉水上源，在陕西省西南部。

Mian
Basic explanation of words
Mian
miǎn
The current fills the river.
[Mianshui] The name of the water is the upper stream of Han River in Shaanxi Province, China.
Gu Tong "snap" and indulged.
Mian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［miǎn］
["Guangyun" is cut in full, on the top, Ming. ]
Also known as "汅1".
(1) The water flow is full.
(2) Through "湎". Addicted.
(3) Water name. Beiyuan was born in the west of Liuba County, Shaanxi Province, and a name from Jushui; Xiyuan was born in the north of Ningqiang County. After the two sources merged, it was called Hanshui, so it was also called Hanshui in ancient times. After the water entered the river, the Yangtze River below Wuhan City, Hubei Province today was also commonly known as Mianshui in ancient times. Therefore, the "Shui Jing" describes the lower reaches of the water until it enters the sea.
Mian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　 Mian; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 611 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Mi Yan cut [Zheng Yun] beautifully distinguished cut,? Sound Burmese. Water name. [Said the text] Mian Shui came out of Donglang Valley in Ju County, Wudu. 【Book·Yugong】Floating in diving, surpassing Mian. [Biography] Han Shang said Mian.　[Guang Yu Ji] Moukou, in the southwest of Hanyang Fucheng. [Explanation of Geography] The place where the Han River enters the river is called Miankou. 【Hanyang Picture Scripture】Han Mian is one water.　Also the name of the state. [Guangyun] The land of Yun State in the Spring and Autumn Period, belonged to Chu during the Warring States Period, and belonged to Nanjun during the Warring States Period, and Mianzhou was established in the early days of Wude. [Guang Yu Ji] This is Hanyang Mansion.　Mianyang Prefecture, belonging to Anlu Mansion, Jingling Land of Han Dynasty, Liang Mianyang. Also Mian County, belongs to Hanzhong Mansion, this Han Mianyang County. And Mianchi County, belongs to Henan Prefecture. ? See [Guang Yu Ji].　The water is full again. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Mianbi flowing water, dynasty Yuhai.　It's connected with 湎 again. 【Historical Records·Book of Music】Liu Mian Shen Yi.　[Jiyun] Meiyuqie, Yinmin. Water name. 【Book·Yugong Note】Mianchi. Reluctant to die in one voice.　Mother and maid cut again, sound mi. Same as Feng. The water is full of beauty. Detailed note of the word.

Mian
Name meaning
Water name. The source of the Han River is in the southwest of Shaanxi Province.
miǎn
I прил.
* полноводный
沔彼流水 полно воден этот поток
II собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 沔水) Мяньшуй (местное название реки Хань-шуй в уезде 沔县 Мяньсянь пров. Шэньси)
2) геогр. (сокр. вм. 沔县) Мяньсянь (уезд в пров. Шэньси)
3) ист., геогр. (сокр. вм.; 沔州) Мяньчжоу (округ: а) в пров. Хубэй; б) в пров. Шэньси)
